name: beads-workflow
description: A high-stakes engineering workflow powered by Beads (issue tracking) and Obsidian (planning).
instructions: This extension enforces a rigorous 'Planning First' philosophy. Always respect the user's configuration: Use the value of the environment variable `BEADS_PLAN_DIR` (defaulting to `working/plans`) as the base directory for all implementation plans in Obsidian. Ensure the `obsidian` MCP tools are available before attempting to save or read plans.
